Items.Title: Oversight – Social Security and Seniors
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to authorize a minimum $250 economic stimulus payment for Social Security and Supplemental Security Income beneficiaries to aid seniors and persons with disabilities during these difficult economic times given that there will be no automatic Social Security cost of living adjustment in 2010.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Social Security cost of living increase (COLA).

Items.Title: Oversight – Social Security and Seniors
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to authorize a minimum $250 economic stimulus payment for Social Security and Supplemental Security Income beneficiaries to aid seniors and persons with disabilities during these difficult economic times given that there will be no automatic Social Security cost of living adjustment in 2010.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Social Security cost of living increase (COLA).
